context: In 2024, Palantir has 1.59% market share in the big-data-analytics market and competes with 44 tools in the category. Palantir maintains a strong foothold in the government sector with contracts accounting for approximately 54.9% of its revenue ($1.2 billion in early 2024). Databricks is a major competitor with 16.49% market share. Cloud hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Amazon) offer extensive cloud analytics and AI tools, often leveraging existing client ecosystems. The competition includes specialized platforms like Snowflake and Databricks focusing on data lakehouse and generative AI capabilities.
